description: This file defines a React component for handling the Jira OAuth callback page in a Next.js application. It manages the authentication response, displays status messages, and redirects appropriately.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main exported component that displays a Suspense boundary wrapping the inner OAuth callback handler.

methods.name: JiraOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Handles the OAuth callback logic, reads URL parameters, updates status, and manages redirection.
